widget.convert: { "template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(5, 3), size=(60, 30), flags=BT_SCALE, png=0), # Flag pixmap. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(75, 0), size=(315, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), # Native language name. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(400, 0), size=(290, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), # English language name. # MultiContentEntryText(pos=(700, 0), size=(60, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=3), # Locale name. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(700, 0), size=(65, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=4), # Package name. MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(775, 4), size=(30, 27), flags=BT_SCALE, png=5) # Status pixmap. ], "fonts": [parseFont("SMSHelperFont;23")], "itemHeight": 35 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(10, 0), size=(48, 48), png=1), # Expandable / expanded / verticalline icon. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(70, 0), size=(760, 48), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), # Host name. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(160, 0), size=(670, 25), font=1, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=3), # Share name. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(180, 25), size=(670, 23), font=2, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=4, color="TextIndented", color_sel="TextIndentedSelected"), # Share description. MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(48, 0), size=(48, 48), png=5), # NFS / CIFS icon. MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(100, 0), size=(48, 48), png=6) # Mounted icon. ], "fonts": [parseFont("Regular;25"), parseFont("Regular;22"), parseFont("Regular;17")], "itemHeight": 48 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(20, 6), size=(48, 48), png=0), # Mounted pixmap. MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(70, 6), size=(48, 48), png=5), # Mount type pixmap. MultiContentEntryText(pos=(160, 0), size=(370, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), # Share name. { "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(100, 0), size=(690, 35), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), # Interface name.
